junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Ilja Preuss wrote:
> 
>> Sorry, I don't understand this. How do you enforce the constraints in
>> code?
> 
> e.g.
> 
> if (argument > maximum_allowed_value) {
>    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Parameter too large"); }

Why would you hold other implementations from being more relaxed regarding
pre conditions? With other words, what if the implementation actually
handles bigger argument values gracefully - how would that be a problem?

Still curious, Ilja
